default.title: Default
default.description: Default settings of the source file

mandelbrot.description: Fractal generated by the function z^2 + c

burning_ship.description: Fractal generated by the function cabs z^2 + c

celtic.description: Fractal generated by the function rabs(z^2) + c

buffalo.title: Buffalo Fractal
buffalo.description: Variation of the Burning Ship Formular

mandelbrot_perpendicular.title: Perpendicular Mandelbrot Fractal
mandelbrot_perpendicular.description: A combination of the Tricorn and the Burning Ship Fractal

burningship_perpendicular.title: Perpendicular Burning Ship Fractal
burningship_perpendicular.description: A variation of the Burning Ship Fractal

celtic_perpendicular.title: Perpendicular Celtic Fractal
celtic_perpendicular.description: A combination of the Tricorn and Celtic Fractal

simonbrot.title: Simonbrot Fractal
simonbrot.description: Fractal discovered by Simon Ferre at Fractal Forums

generic_mandel3.title: Generic Mandelbrot of Power 3
generic_mandel3.description: Mandelbrot Set of Power 3 with three freely selectable parameters

parameters.z0: (alpha + beta + gamma + sqrt((alpha + beta + gamma)^2 - 3:0 * (alpha * beta + alpha * gamma + beta * gamma))) / 3

lambda.title: Lambda Fractal
lambda.description: Fractal generated by the function z (1 - z) c

multibrot_div_z.title: Multibrot with reciprocal addend
multibrot_div_z.description: A variation of the Multibrot Fractal

fractional_mandel.title: Fractional mandelbrot formula
fractional_mandel.description: A variation of the Multibrot Fractal

cczcpaczcp.title: Cczcpaczcp
cczcpaczcp.description: A Multibrot variation that combines two powers (source: element90 blog)

parameters.function: (alpha * z ^ beta + gamma * z ^ delta) * c
z^2 + re c + lastZ * im c

sinh.title: Hyperbolic Sine Fractal
sinh.description: Fractal based on the hyperbolic sine function

magnet1.title: Magnet-1 Fractal
magnet1.description: Fractal generated by a function that is derived from magnetic phase-transitions

magnet2.title: Magnet-2 Fractal
magnet2.description: Fractal generated by a function that is derived from magnetic phase-transitions

newton3.title: Newton of Power 3
newton3.description: Newton fractal of a simple formula

genericnewton3.title: Generic Newton Set of Power 3
genericnewton3.description: Newton Mandelbrot Set with freely selectable fixed points

parameters.function: newton((z - alpha) * (z - beta) * (z - gamma) + c, z)

newtonsinh.title: Newton Set of Sine Function
newtonsinh.description: Newton Mandelbrot Set based on the Sine Function

nova3.title: Nova Fractal of Power 3
nova3.description: Nova fractal based on a simple formula

genericnova3.title: Generic Nova Set of Power 3
genericnova3.description: Nova Set with three freely selectable parameters

parameters.function: newton((z - alpha) * (z - beta) * (z - gamma), z) + c

zirkonzity.title: Zirkon Zity
zirkonzity.description: A Lyapunov fractal view with towers and a bridge

domaincoloring1.title: Domain Coloring 1
domaincoloring1.description: Domain Coloring of Complex Function with Stepsize 1

parameters.colorValue: argnorm value : 0.66667 (abs value - floor abs value)

domaincoloringlog2.title: Domain Coloring using log2
domaincoloringlog2.description: Domain Coloring of Complex Function with stepsize times 2

parameters.colorValue: argnorm value : 0.66667 (log abs value / log 2 - floor (log abs value / log 2))
